name: Suzanne Adler
title: Co-Founder
description: Suzanne Adler is a resident of Jackson Heights and a long time fan of murals and community art.  She is a co-founder of The Arc Residential Team at Compass.

title: Co-Founder
description: Riha, a proud Queens native, calls Jackson Heights home. She is the founding tech and design lead for Everest Federal Credit Union (EFCU), the first Nepalese-American credit union. There, she oversees the bank’s tech team and leads the brand strategy.
